item.title: Machine Learning : Understanding By Doing
item.description: This post will be about helping you understand the basics of the main machine learning task : classification. More specifically, we are going to scratch the surface of linear classification and quickly address non linear classification. I assume some basic knowledge in probability and regression. Linear Classification Let’s start by simple examples depicted in the introduction to statistical learning by G.James, D.Witten, T.Hastie, R.Tibshirani (which I highly recommend along with the element of statistical learning by the same authors).
